games.title: Charlie the Duck
games.description: A colorful platformer where you play as Charlie, a duck on an adventure to save his girlfriend.

games.title: Commander Keen 1: Marooned on Mars
games.description: The original Commander Keen! Help 8-year-old genius Billy Blaze escape from Mars.

games.title: Commander Keen 2: The Earth Explodes
games.description: Keen must stop the Vorticons from destroying Earth! Episode 2 of the original trilogy.

games.title: Commander Keen 3: Keen Must Die!
games.description: The epic conclusion to the Vorticon trilogy. Defeat the Grand Intellect!

games.title: Commander Keen 4: Secret of the Oracle
games.description: The Goodbye Galaxy saga begins! Keen explores the Shadowlands to find the Oracle.

games.title: Commander Keen 5: The Armageddon Machine
games.description: Keen infiltrates the Omegamatic to stop the Shikadi from destroying the galaxy!

games.title: Commander Keen 6: Aliens Ate My Baby Sitter!
games.description: Keen's babysitter has been kidnapped by the Bloogs! Time for another rescue mission.

games.title: Commander Keen 7: The Keys of Krodacia
games.description: A fan-made Keen adventure! Find the keys to save Krodacia.

games.title: Commander Keen 8: Dead in the Desert
games.description: Another fan-made Keen adventure set in a desert world.

games.title: Commander Keen 9: Battle of the Brains
games.description: Fan-made finale! Keen faces his greatest challenge yet.

games.title: Jetpack
games.description: Classic DOS platform game - collect emeralds with your jetpack!

games.title: Keen Dreams
games.description: Commander Keen in the land of vegetables! A unique side-story in the Keen saga.

games.title: Mario Teaches Typing
games.description: Learn to type with Mario! An educational typing game featuring Nintendo's famous plumber.
